name: Viridescent Venerer's Diadem
description:
When you play a Talent card or a Character uses a Skill: Spend 1 less Anemo Die. (Once per Round)
(A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact)
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When you play a {SPRITE_PRESET#3006}Talent card or a Character uses a Skill:</color> Spend 1 less {SPRITE_PRESET#1105}<color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo</color> Die. (Once per Round)\n(A character can equip a maximum of 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3004}Artifact)
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When you play a {SPRITE_PRESET#3006}Talent card or a Character uses a Skill:</color> Spend 1 less {SPRITE_PRESET#1105}<color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo</color> Die. (Once per Round)\n(A character can equip a maximum of 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3004}Artifact)
storytext: "None could ever bestow a crown upon the queen of hunters, for only earth and heaven were higher than she."
